15 Tahun Berkarya, Magenta Orchestra Persembahkan Konser MOXV
07 Nov 2019, 14:45 by Windy Eka Pramudya
MENGINJAK usia 15 tahun, kelompok Magenta Orchestra di bawah pimpinan Andi Rianto akan menggelar konser. Pertunjukan spesial yang bertajuk Konser Magenta Orchestra 15 Tahun (MOXV) ini akan berlangsung di Jakarta International Velodrome, Jalan Balap Sepeda, Pulogadung, Jakarta Timur, Sabtu, 23 November 2019.
Di konser yang dipromotori Merah Putih Persada ini, Magenta Orchestra akan menampilkan kolaborasi bersama sejumlah musisi. Mereka adalah Sheila Majid, Bunga Citra Lestari, Raisa, Christian Bautista, Gamaliel dan Audrey Tapiheru, Andrea Miranda, dan Friendz Choir. Dipandu Andi Rianto sebagai konduktor, komponis, dan founder Magenta Orchestra, sebanyak 65 musisi akan menampilkan pergelaran musik yang spesial.
"Konser ini menjadi kesempatan untuk menyapa penikmat musik Indonesia. Salah satu tujuannya adalah kami ingin mematahkan stigma kalau pertunjukan musik orkestra itu membosankan atau segmen pendengarnya terbatas," tutur Andi pada jumpa wartawan di Galeri Indonesia Kaya, Jakarta, Kamis, 6 November 2019.
Andi menyebutkan, para musisi yang terlibat kebanyakan sudah pernah bekerja sama dengan dia, tapi belum pernah khusus di konser Magenta Orchestra. Untuk lagu yang disuguhkan, Andi juga memilih repertoar yang dinamis. Andi akan menyuguhkan hit para penyanyi yang sudah diaransemen ulang, dan lagu-lagu gubahan Andi.
"Konser ini akan menampilkan banyak kejutan. Kami akan membawakan lagu-lagu yang ramah di telinga. Tak hanya lagu populer yang dikemas dengan aransemen orkestra, tapi ada juga lagu tradisi dari daerah-daerah di Indonesia," ungkap Andi.
Menurut Andi, durasi konser akan berjalan sekitar dua jam. Selama dua jam itu, Magenta Orchestra sudah menyiapkan 23 nomor produksi yang merangkum lebih dari 30 lagu. Pada beberapa lagu Andi membuat komposisi medley.



Andi mengakui, bertahan selama 15 tahun bersama Magenta Orchestra bukan hal mudah. Dia banyak belajar dan meraup pengalaman. Setelah konser MOXV, Andi berharap, perjalanan dia dan Magenta Orchestra bisa terus berlanjut dan bisa terus menghadirkan pertunjukan musik yang berkualitas.
"Dari awal mendirikan Magenta Orchestra, tujuan saya ingin mengakrabkan musik orkestra. Saya ingin konsisten dengan tujuan itu. Untuk terus bertahan, saya terus berinovasi, mendengarkan musik-musik terbaru dan dari berbagai genre. Yang terpenting, bermusik itu harus jujur dari hati," ucap Andi.
Salah satu penampil, Gamaliel Tapiheru dan Audrey Tapiheru mengaku sangat senang bisa terlibat di konser MOXV. Bagi Gamal dan Audrey, Andi Rianto dan Magenta Orchestra telah menjadi bagian sejarah perjalanan karier mereka. Pasalnya, sembilan tahun lalu, mereka pertama kali tampil di televisi dan di panggung besar bersama Andi Rianto dan Magenta Orchestra.
"Kami sudah mulai workshop, seru banget. Kalau dulu kami datang, latihan, musiknya sudah jadi, jadi tinggal nyanyi. Kalau sekarang, kami ikut terlibat di pemilihan lagu dan aransemen. Jujur saja, kami antusias. Semoga kami bisa tampil maksimal dan menghibur," ujar Gamal.
Jay Subyakto terlibat
Selain performa para musisi, konser MOXV juga melibatkan banyak pihak. Mereka adalah Jay Subyakto sebagai art director, Taba Sanchabactiar sebagai multimedia director, dan Inet Leimena sebagai stage director.
Art Director Jay Subyakto mengatakan, untuk konser MOXV dia mencari tempat yang tak biasa. Dia bahkan sudah ke Yogyakarta karena mempertimbangkan konser digelar di candi. Namun, pilihan kemudian jatuh kepada Jakarta International Velodrome.
"Kebetulan saya terlibat di Asian Para Games 2018, saya jadi tahu ada venue olah raga yang bisa dipakai konser. Buat saya, velodrome ini unik dan sempurna untuk jadi tempat konser. Saya lihat di negara lain juga banyak bekas arena Olimpiade yang terbengkalai karena tidak dipakai, padahal bisa jadi tempat konser," ungkap Jay.
Setelah menentukan lokasi konser, Jay mulai merancang bentuk panggung, video mapping, dan sistem tata suara agar akustiknya sempurna. Bagi Jay, tata suara yang dihasilkan harus sesempurna mungkin, karena MOXV merupakan konser musik orkestra.
Oktariadi Anis dari Merah Putih Persada selaku promotor menyebutkan, konsep konser datang dari Andi Rianto dan Magenta Orchestra. Sebelumnya, Merah Putih Persada terlibat di konser sepuluh tahun Magenta Orchestra. Jadi, untuk konser 15 tahun ini, promotor sudah punya dasar.
Okta menyebutkan, harga tiket konser MOXV berkisar antara Rp 275 ribu sampai Rp 1,65 juta. Dengan kapasitas 2.433 kursi, untuk saat ini, sekitar 75 persen tiket sudah terjual.***

15 Years of Work, Magenta Orchestra Presents MOXV Concert
Nov 7 2019, 14:45 by Windy Eka Pramudya
IN THE age of 15, the Magenta Orchestra group under the leadership of Andi Rianto will hold a concert. The special performance, titled the 15-Year Magenta Orchestra Concert (MOXV) will take place at the Jakarta International Velodrome, Bicycle Race Road, Pulogadung, East Jakarta, Saturday, 23 November 2019.
At the concert promoted by Red and White Persada, the Magenta Orchestra will feature collaborations with a number of musicians. They are Sheila Majid, Bunga Citra Lestari, Raisa, Christian Bautista, Gamaliel and Audrey Tapiheru, Andrea Miranda, and Friendz Choir. Guided by Andi Rianto as conductor, composer and founder of Magenta Orchestra, as many as 65 musicians will present special musical performances.
"This concert is an opportunity to greet Indonesian music lovers. One of the goals is that we want to break the stigma that orchestral music shows are boring or the audience segment is limited," Andi said at a press conference at the Rich Indonesia Gallery, Jakarta, Thursday, November 6, 2019.
Andi said, the musicians involved had mostly worked with him, but had never been specifically at the Magenta Orchestra concert. For the songs that were presented, Andi also chose a dynamic repertoire. Andi will be presenting hit singers who have been re-arranged, and songs composed by Andi.
"This concert will feature many surprises. We will bring friendly songs to the ears. Not only are popular songs packed with orchestral arrangements, but there are also traditional songs from regions in Indonesia," Andi said.
According to Andi, the duration of the concert will run around two hours. During those two hours, Magenta Orchestra has prepared 23 production numbers that summarize more than 30 songs. In some songs Andi made medley compositions.



Andi admitted, surviving for 15 years with the Magenta Orchestra was not easy. He learned a lot and gained experience. After the MOXV concert, Andi hopes that he and Magenta Orchestra's journey will continue and can continue to present quality music performances.
"From the beginning of establishing the Magenta Orchestra, my goal was to familiarize orchestral music. I want to be consistent with that goal. To continue to survive, I continue to innovate, listen to the latest music and from various genres. Most importantly, music must be honest from the heart," said Andi.
One of the performers, Gamaliel Tapiheru and Audrey Tapiheru claimed to be very happy to be involved in the MOXV concert. For Gamal and Audrey, Andi Rianto and Magenta Orchestra have become part of the history of their career. Because, nine years ago, they first appeared on television and on the big stage with Andi Rianto and the Magenta Orchestra.
"We have started the workshop, it was very exciting. If we had come, rehearsed, the music was ready, so it was just singing. Now, we are involved in song selection and arrangement. To be honest, we are enthusiastic. Hopefully we can perform optimally and entertain, "Gamal said.
Jay Subyakto is involved
Besides the performance of the musicians, the MOXV concert also involved many parties. They are Jay Subyakto as art director, Taba Sanchabactiar as multimedia director, and Inet Leimena as stage director.
Art Director Jay Subyakto said, for the MOXV concert he was looking for an unusual place. He even went to Yogyakarta because he was considering a concert to be held at the temple. However, the choice then fell to Jakarta International Velodrome.
"I happen to be involved in the 2018 Asian Para Games, I learned that there are sports venues that can be used for concerts. For me, this velodrome is unique and perfect for being a concert venue. , even though it could be a concert venue, "said Jay.
After determining the location of the concert, Jay began designing the stage form, video mapping, and sound system so that the acoustics were perfect. For Jay, the sound system produced must be as perfect as possible, because MOXV is an orchestral music concert.
Oktariadi Anis from Merah Putih Persada as the promoter said that the concept of the concert came from Andi Rianto and the Magenta Orchestra. Previously, Merah Putih Persada was involved in the ten-year Magenta Orchestra concert. So, for this 15-year concert, the promoter already has a basis.
Okta said, MOXV concert ticket prices range from Rp 275 thousand to Rp 1.65 million. With a capacity of 2,433 seats, to date, around 75 percent of tickets have been sold. ***
